name: Loaded Dice (willj)
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, with the theme "Roll of the Dice"

Loaded Dice is a top-down space shooter, where you control a ship and try to survive waves of dice-shaped enemies without them touching you.  When you hit an enemy with a shot, it randomly rolls a new value, and on a roll of 1, is destroyed.  

Red enemies are faster than the standard White, and Blue enemies are tougher (though slower).

Controls:

Move with WASD

Aim and Shoot with the Mouse

Credits:

William Johnston

Luben Popov

Paul Vonder Haar
